abstrac: Architectural and Mechanical Design, Development and Consulting
bio:
Residential Architectural Design and Development.
Structural Integrity Development and Design.
Light Commercial Design.
Building Code Review and Consultation.
Site Layouts and Development.
Machine Design and Development. Injection Mold Design / Product Design and Development. Engineering and Design Department Organization and Consulting.
AutoCad Implementation and Customization. Project Management.
I am well versed in the industry with 20 years of experience in several disciplines of Design and Engineering... Architecture, Mechanical design, Plastics design, Injection Mold design, Machine design, Project management, Building construction, Building Codes, tooling and fixturing.

Residential architectural rate is $2 / sq. ft. Light Commercial architectural rate is $4 / sq. ft. Licensed Design Professional stamp available from third party for New York State and Pennsylvania. Other types of projects per project budget or as agreed upon.
Will work on site for local projects.Payment through Guru.com preferred. Other arrangements possible.
Prefer to communicate through email or by phone, will meet in person for local projects.Design contract may be required for some projects.

abstrac: I am an honest and hard working individual who enjoys using 20 years of IT experience to benefit others.
bio:
I grew up with parents who were both teachers who encouraged hard work, honesty, and creativity. Most importantly I have developed the personally mentality to not be afraid of learning new things. I enjoy the IT world because it allows me to use build on one skill or another.

Thanks to ideals upheld as an Eagle Scout, the people I work with can always be assured of my honesty and willingness to work above and beyond the basic requirements of a given task. 

I have a diverse experience base in Information Systems, including network engineering, systems security, SIEM, WiFi, Unix/Linux, and programming. I am never afraid to point out my limitations to others in addition to a willingness to learn.

I have been specializing increasingly in network engineering, NetFlow, systems monitoring, HIDS/NIDS, SIEM, and Aruba-based WiFi. I hold various certifications, and I am currently working on the CEH.

24x7 availability, I can travel in limited cases, working from home is ideal, but I don't have a problem coming onsite if needed. I charge at least $45 per hour, depending on the needs of the customer/project.

abstrac: We Listen. We Understand. We Deliver
bio:
Mind Digital Group (http://www.minddigital.com) is an independent digital company that is focused on servicing global clients and partner agencies. With offices in New York, London, and New Delhi we are able to provide support globally for all your digital needs. If you are looking for onshore or offshore development, a complete knockout digital marketing and sales strategy, we can help. 

We have done significant work in the areas of building dynamic and feature rich portals which leverage open source technologies, social media platforms and enable collaboration between users. We have certified in house developers with expertise in PHP, HTML5, CSS, .NET & SalesForce CRM (development & implementation). We have worked on many PHP based opensource CMS such as Drupal, Joomla, Magento, Wordpress.

We look forward to developing a long term relationship with you and please feel free to reach out regarding any questions you may have. Thanks again for taking time to read our profile :-)

Expertise: The team consists of highly qualified specialists within development and online marketing. Our results speak for themselves and it can been seen within our team who are trained & certified within the constantly evolving online marketplace.

Data Driven Approach: All decisions regarding online activity are driven by the data that we receive, process and collaborate with our clients. 

Integration of online & offline marketing: We ensure that our clients online marketing plans are integrated within their overall marketing strategy.

Transparency: The tracking &  billing that we provide for our clients is fully transparent. We can also provide any customized reporting that may be needed based upon the needs of our clients.

We look forward to developing a long term relationship with you as our client and please feel free to reach out regarding any questions you may have. Thanks again for taking the time to read our profile :-)

bio: We are a team of young powerpoint design enthusiast who specialize in Powerpoint Presentation Services. We have 8+ years of experience working with Fortune 500 customers. With the aspiration to be the Trendsetters in business presentations, our dynamic teams are passionately working to help our client deliver outstanding business presentations.Visual Spiders primarily focuses on helping our customers with Powerpoint Presentations. Our Powerpoint Presentation Services is categorized into 3 categories1) Bronze Service: Production of slides with raw data in the form of faxes, document, pdf, etc. as input 2) Silver Service: Enhancing the overall look and feel of the presentations 3) Gold Service: Coming up with Theme-based Presentations which will be crisp, graphically superiror and easily understandable In addition to Presentation focus, we also offer other services such as Powerpoint template designing, Print media designing (posters, brochures, flyers, annual reports, etc.) and Proposal

Assured Satisfaction:Our 100% Satisfaction assures that your project will be completed quickly and professionally CommunicationsWe use various communication channels whichever is comfortable for our clients.  You can contact us using Skype, Messenger, Guru Message Boards, Emails or via Phone.Business HoursMonday to Friday: 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM ISTPayment terms We accept payments through Guru Payment System

bio:
I'm a Biologist and freelance journalist and write Nutrition and Health articles. I have an excellent knowledge of nutrition, nutraceuticals, herbs, and health, and will write informative, engaging, evidence-based Nutrition articles geared towards your readers' preferences. 

I can write nutrition articles based on your specific target audience's demographics and psychographics.  I have my own Nutrition and Medicine blog , and I always use medical research journals to provide the evidence of my articles.

You can view my articles at:
